transcript:
Hello.
Hello, good afternoon sir.
Boliye.
Sir se baat baat kar rahe the sir.
Boliye.
Sir aapne mail dala tha ki aapko machine se related koi bhi requirement nahi aa rahi hai aur jo aa rahi hai wo false requirement aa rahi hai.
Aisa koi mail dala nahi hai. Ek mail dala hai jo abhi phone karke dekha uska machine ka koi requirement nahi hai.
Sorry sir jo aapne.
Usko pucha hai uska machine ka koi requirement nahi hai.
Achcha aapne ye mail dala tha ki machine ka requirement nahi hai.
Isiliye ye mail paste karke aapko diya hai.
Sir agar aapko is koi baat karni hai na to aap mere number pe call kar sakte hain.
Baat kiya hum customer se hum customer se baat kiya hai.
Okay.
Uska number bhi hum aapko diya hai uska details bhi hum aapko diya hai.
Call to this number okay.
Ab ab aap baat karna hai to baat kar lijiye.
Thik hai sir to inki requirement aayi thi koi aapke paas.
Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving false machine requirements.

- Customer says he didn't send such email.



Resolution:

- Executive says customer sent a mail about requirements.

- Customer says he has already talked to the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer can talk to the customer if he wants.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, requirements, machine
